commit.message:
2003-12-02  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* java/nio/channels/spi/AbstractInterruptibleChannel.java
	(opened): Removed.
	(closed): New field.
	(close): Check of channel is closed already.
	(isOpen): Return !closed.

From-SVN: r74182

+	* java/nio/channels/spi/AbstractInterruptibleChannel.java
+	(opened): Removed.
+	(closed): New field.
+	(close): Check of channel is closed already.
+	(isOpen): Return !closed.
+
